page.title: 16RECREATION - Brocton Village
page.content: In 1915 a wooden cabin was built for Brocton villagers for their community activities.In 1953 enough money was raised for a new hall.It was completed in 1960/61 Since then it has had an extension in 1981.Mr Mudway is the present Chairman and has been since 1975 and it was his 10th Anniversary this year.There are 10 people on the committee The needs of the village are high these days as the village has doubled in size in the last few years.They have dances,skittles,social evenings,fashion shows,choirs,Sunday lunches,bazzars, Brownies,Playgroup,W.I.,Brocton Wives, Keep fit,junior disco and as a Polling station.Junior disco's are very popular and they have Brownies staying there all through August.Mr Mudway says he enjoys being Chairman. (Nicola Moore Age 11)
